desc: 100% boost to Atk, Def, considerably boosts OD gauge fill rate, probable slight damage reduction, boosts Atk and Def by 50% relative to max HP, adds slight probability of resistance against 1 KO attack & lowers max HP by 40%

dictionary.lore: The siege of Rehdoon was a victory for the Raug, made possible by the tenous cooperation between the three demonic overlords. While famine and revolt rampaged throughout the land, Malachus hardened hearts and enflamed passions among the nobility and peasantry alike. With everyone save a few embracing death with hedonistic abandon, the Raug overlords began the next stage of their plans. The desire to consume, feel and live is something that Malachus knows all too well. And when one's desires are limited by boundaries and taboos, the harbinger is only too happy to ensnare them in her schemes, even if it means involving her siblings.

name: Harbinger Arisen
